request.description:
gett all notifications, 
if the body is empty , it gets all notifications literally.
but if the body has fields "startDays" & "daysCount" :
startDays (number):

The number of days to go back from today to define the end of the date range.
If 0, the end date is the start of today.
Examples:
0 means the end date is today.
3 means the end date is 3 days ago.
daysCount (number):

The number of days before the end date to define the start of the date range.
Examples:
7 means the start date is 7 days before the end date.
30 means the start date is 30 days before the end date.
the body must have the "text" field of the notification

body must contain: 
"_id" of the notification.
"text" of the updated notification

body must contain: 
"_id" of the notification that you want to delete
